鵛鵛鵛

鵛字的基本解释

鵛
jìng
〔与鵛〕古书中所说的一种吃蛇的怪鸟。

鵛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jǐng］
［《廣韻》居郢切，上静，見。］
［《廣韻》巨成切，平清，見。］
“颈1”的繁体字。亦作“頚1”。亦作“鵛1”。
(1)颈项。头部与躯干连接的部分。又称脖子。
(2)指物体像人体颈部的部位。
(3)引颈。谓仰慕、期待。
(4)径直；直接。
(5)星名。
[②]［gěng］
“颈2”的繁体字。亦作“頚2”。亦作“鵛2”。
见“脖頸”。

鵛字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵛； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1490第27
【廣韻】古靈切【集韻】堅靈切，?音經。鳥名。【爾雅·釋鳥】輿頸鷋。【郭註】未詳。【廣雅】鵛雀，怪鳥。

鵛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鵛字的起名意思

暂无。

鵛
Basic explanation of words
鵛
jìng
〔和鵛〕A strange bird that eats snakes as mentioned in ancient books.
鵛
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jǐng］
["Guangyun" Ju Yingqie, Shangjing, see you. ]
["Guangyun" is a huge cut, calm and clear, see you. ]
Traditional Chinese characters for "领1". Also known as "頚1". Also known as "鵛1".
(1) Neck. The part where the head connects to the torso. Also known as the neck.
(2) Refers to the part where the object resembles the neck of the human body.
(3) Lead the neck. It means admiration and expectation.
(4) Straight; direct.
(5) Star name.
[②]［gěng］
Traditional Chinese characters for "neck 2". Also known as "頚2". Also known as "鵛2".
See "neck".
鵛
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵛; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1490 Page 27
[Guang Yun] Ancient Ling Qi [Ji Yun] Hard Ling Qi,? Sound Classics. The name of the bird. 【Erya·Shiniao】Ground your neck. [Guo Note] Unknown. [Guang Ya] Buffalo, strange bird.
鵛

鵛
Name meaning
Nothing.
jīng
сущ. странная птица, пернатое необычного вида
